title: Detail and Section View of Wood Ceiling, Sacristy at St. Zeno, Verona
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite on thick cream wove paper tipped into binding with fabric
description: Vertical sheet showing cross section of a wooden ceiling created by a curved upper section of wall that meets flat paneling and coffers. The drawing above is a detail of the coffered ceiling, painted in shades of yellow, blue, and salmon.
name: Album page
